title: Eutelsat reversing course with European retail broadband business sale
summary: Eutelsat told the Paris stock exchange June 15 it is selling its European retail broadband activities to “an experienced private operator” to return focus to wholesale services.

title: BREAKING! NASA Partners With SpaceX, Blue Origin, Sierra Space + 4 Others For Future Commercial Space Capabilities
summary: In a significant move to foster innovation and advance the future of human spaceflight and the U.S. commercial low Earth orbit economy, NASA has announced the second Collaborations for Commercial Space Capabilities-2 initiative (CCSC-2) and is partners with with seven American companies.

title: Seven US Companies Collaborate with NASA to Advance Space Capabilities
summary: NASA will partner with seven U.S. companies to meet future business and government needs, ultimately benefitting human spaceflight and the U.S. commercial low Earth orbit economy.

title: Virgin Galactic sets late June date for first commercial SpaceShipTwo flight
summary: Virgin Galactic announced June 15 that it plans to conduct the first commercial flight of its SpaceShipTwo suborbital vehicle in late June on a mission for the Italian Air Force.

title: Virgin Galactic sets first commercial space tourism flight for this month; shares spike more than 40%
summary: Virgin Galactic aims to launch its commercial space tourism service in late June.
